thread.section_title: Goldmoney.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goldmoney.com | www.goldmoney.com
thread.title: Santiago Vega

author: Santiago Vega
title: Santiago Vega
text:
Using Goldmoney makes it really easy to maintain a periodic bullion saving habit. The technology is great and what it does is quite remarkable. I set it up to take a fixed amount out of my account on a monthly basis and it built into something really substantial over time. I would recommended it on that basis alone.
I had a hiccup with a MasterCard transaction, but it was resolved within the week - I just had to contact the team.
